HexagonalCell
=============
The HexagonalCell provides a class definition for a generation of unit cells
with a hexagonal cubic distribution of the inclusions. The class inherits from
the GenericUnitCell class and extends it in order to specify the remaining
placeholder methods of the GenericModel. Especially, methods to determine the
cells size and place the inclusions are provided.

Class Definition
----------------

   :show-inheritance:
   :members:
